'''Caitlin Freeman''' is the daughter of [[Shara Freeman]].

==History==
Caitlin came to the hospital with her mother, Shara, who had a history of abdominal wall sarcoma, which left her with painful scar tissue. After Shara's surgery was delayed, Caitlin became upset with Meredith. Meredith tried to reassure her. When it was delayed a second time, Meredith announced that they had permission to extend the day until everyone had gotten their surgery and they'd be doing more days, one per month.

==Relationships==
===Familial===
She was a strong advocate for her mother getting the surgery she needed to relieve her pain.
